tourBios.carHigh:
2012: Averaged 69.96 strokes over seven events, finishing 22nd on the Order of Merit. Held the 54-hole lead before finishing third at The Great Waterway Classic.

2011: Finished 25th on the Order of Merit, highlighted by a T2 Finish at the Syncrude Boreal Open in Fort McMurray.

2010: Finished 72nd on the Order of Merit, making the cut in his first Canadian Tour event, a T10 at the Corona Mazatlan Mexican PGA Championship...Averaged 70.67 strokes over 10 events for the season...Earned exempt status after finishing runner-up at the California Winter Qualifying School.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Named an Academic All-American in 2008 and 2009 at Georgia Tech, graduating with highest honors. Member of three ACC Championship teams and the 2005 NCAA runner-up team
tourBios.personal: Enjoys fly fishing...Has worked with legendary instructors Jim Flick and Bob Toski...Favorite golf courses played are Augusta National and Broadmoor East Course...Golf course he'd most like to play is Pine Valley...Favorite pro team is the Denver Broncos...Favorite artist is Radiohead...Favorite city to visit is Rome.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Canada was T2nd in 2011 at the Syncrude Boreal Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 70th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the PGA TOUR Canada.
